be.kuleuven.cs.oss.sonarfacade

Class WebServiceSonarFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.kuleuven.cs.oss.sonarfacade.WebServiceSonarFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SonarFacade, org.sonar.api.Extension, org.sonar.api.ServerComponent, org.sonar.api.ServerExtension

    public class WebServiceSonarFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements SonarFacade, org.sonar.api.ServerExtension
    This class implements a facade for the Sonar database, by connecting to the web service provided by the Sonar server.
    Author:
    Pieter Agten

    • Constructor Detail

      • WebServiceSonarFacade

        public WebServiceSonarFacade()
        Creates an instance of this class, using the default connection parameters. A connection will be made to the Sonar web service, using the default hostname, username and password.

      • WebServiceSonarFacade

        public WebServiceSonarFacade(java.lang.String host,
                             java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Creates an instance of this class, using user-specified connection parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - The basic connection URL for the web service, e.g.: http://localhost:9000
        username - The username to use for the web service connection
        password - The password to use for the web service connection

      • findMeasure

        public Measure findMeasure(Resource resource,
                           Metric metric)
        Find a measure for a given resource and metric. If multiple measures exist for the given resource and metric, an arbitrary measure is returned.
        Specified by:
        findMeasure in interface SonarFacade
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource for which to find a measure.
        metric - The metric for which to find a measure.
        Returns:
        A measure for the given resource and metric, or null if no such measure exists.
